about_the_game:
The Karugamo Japanese System Voice Pack contains three different Japanese voices that will bring your game to life. These voice files include lines for congratulations, mission complete, battle mode, continue, extra stage and so much more. There are also different styles of sounds from android to reverb and helium influenced voices.

The Karugamo Japanese System Voice Pack is the perfect addition for those looking for a wide variety of Japanese voices with over 400 options to choose from. Furthermore, as a bonus, this pack includes 9 bonus tracks for background music. How do you envision using these Japanese voices in your latest creation?

Features:

* 448 Japanese system voices in m4a, ogg format
* Recorded by three professional voice actors in Japanese
* 9 Bonus BGM/SE music tracks in m4a, ogg

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* NOT OK for use in games with gore
* NOT OK for use in adult-rated games

The Karugamo Japanese System Voice Pack contains three different Japanese voices that will bring your game to life. These voice files include lines for congratulations, mission complete, battle mode, continue, extra stage and so much more. There are also different styles of sounds from android to reverb and helium influenced voices.

The Karugamo Japanese System Voice Pack is the perfect addition for those looking for a wide variety of Japanese voices with over 400 options to choose from.
